name: Professionals Asia
description: Starting off in Malaysia, our aim is to list Professional & Executive Programs with an Expert Profile attached to them, and offer an efficient platform linking Corporate HR and Learning & Development (L&D) Specialists with Subject Matter Experts and Executive Education Providers.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Connecting Experts
ShortDescription: Professionals Asia is Malaysia’s online ‘Continuing Education & Training’ marketplace.

Highlights.name: Executive Education Programs:
Highlights.description: Professionals Asia focuses on providing executive education programs.  This suggests they offer courses and training designed for professionals looking to develop their leadership and management skills.

Highlights.name: Short and Focused Training
Highlights.description: he website emphasizes "Short Training Programs." This indicates that Professionals Asia offers concise and focused training programs, catering to busy professionals who may not have time for extensive coursework.

Highlights.name: Malaysia-Based:
Highlights.description: he website is in English but with a Malaysian domain name (.my) suggesting their primary location is Malaysia. This could indicate a focus on serving professionals in the Malaysian region or businesses operating there.

enhanced_description: Professionals Asia is an online 'Continuing Education & Training' marketplace based in Malaysia, launched in 2021. It aims to connect Corporate HR and Learning & Development (L&D) Specialists with Subject Matter Experts and Executive Education Providers by listing Professional & Executive Programs that include an Expert Profile. The platform focuses on offering short and focused training programs, including wellness in-house programs, utilizing localized search tools and automated customization capabilities to accelerate skill development, improve learning efficiency, and boost employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Connecting Corporate HR/L&D with Subject Matter Experts for training
Connecting Corporate HR/L&D with Executive Education Providers for training
Discovering and enrolling in Professional & Executive Programs
Facilitating continuing education and training for employees
Utilizing localized search for training programs
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
Improving employee happiness and engagement through learning opportunities
competitive_advantages: Efficient platform linking corporate HR/L&D with experts and education providers
Malaysia-specific online marketplace for continuing education and training
Programs listed with attached Expert Profiles
Focus on short and focused training programs
Includes specific 'Wellness in House program' offering
roi_benefits: Accelerated Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
